issue.title: [C++] CMake is unable to find zstd target when ZSTD_SOURCE=SYSTEM
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9084](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9084). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A following problem occurs when arrow-cpp is built against system zstd:
```

CMake Error at cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:1860 (get_target_property):
  get_target_property() called with non-existent target "ZSTD::zstd".
```
